verses.verse: From <S%G4159>where<s%> come <S%G4171>wars<s%> and <S%G3163>fights<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you? come they not <S%G1782>hence,<s%> even of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2237>lusts<s%> that <S%G4754>war<s%> in <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3196>members?<s%>

You <S%G1937>lust,<s%> and <S%G2192>have<s%> not: you <S%G5407>kill,<s%> and <S%G2206>desire<s%> to <S%G2192>have,<s%> and <S%G3756>cannot<s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G2013>obtain:<s%> you <S%G3164>fight<s%> and <S%G4170>war,<s%> <S%G1161>yet<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> not, <S%G1223>because<s%> you <S%G154>ask<s%> not.
You <S%G154>ask,<s%> and <S%G2983>receive<s%> not, <S%G1360>because<s%> you <S%G154>ask<s%> <S%G2560>amiss,<s%> that you may <S%G1159>consume<s%> it on <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2237>lusts.<s%>

You <S%G3432>adulterers<s%> and <S%G3428>adulteresses,<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> you not that the <S%G5373>friendship<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%> is <S%G2189>enmity<s%> with <S%G2316>God?<s%> <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1014>will<s%> be a <S%G5384>friend<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%> is the <S%G2190>enemy<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
Do you <S%G1380>think<s%> that the <S%G1124>scripture<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> in <S%G2761>vain,<s%> The <S%G4151>spirit<s%> that <S%G2730>dwells<s%> in us <S%G1971>lusts<s%> to <S%G5355>envy?<s%>

But he <S%G1325>gives<s%> <S%G3187>more<s%> <S%G5485>grace.<s%> <S%G1352>Why<s%> he <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G498>resists<s%> the <S%G5244>proud,<s%> but <S%G1325>gives<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> to the <S%G5011>humble.<s%>
<S%G5293>Submit<s%> yourselves <S%G3767>therefore<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%> <S%G436>Resist<s%> the <S%G1228>devil,<s%> and he will <S%G5343>flee<s%> from you.

Draw <S%G1448>near<s%> to <S%G2316>God,<s%> and he will draw <S%G1448>near<s%> to you. <S%G2511>Cleanse<s%> your <S%G5495>hands,<s%> you <S%G268>sinners;<s%> and <S%G48>purify<s%> your <S%G2588>hearts,<s%> you <S%G1374>double<s%> <S%G1374>minded.<s%>

Be <S%G5003>afflicted,<s%> and <S%G3996>mourn,<s%> and <S%G2799>weep:<s%> let <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1071>laughter<s%> be <S%G3344>turned<s%> to <S%G3997>mourning,<s%> and <S%G3588>your<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> to <S%G2726>heaviness.<s%>
<S%G5013>Humble<s%> yourselves in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> and he shall <S%G5312>lift<s%> you up.

<S%G2635>Speak<s%> not <S%G2635>evil<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> of <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G80>brothers.<s%> He that <S%G2635>speaks<s%> <S%G2635>evil<s%> of his <S%G80>brother,<s%> and <S%G2919>judges<s%> his <S%G80>brother,<s%> <S%G2635>speaks<s%> <S%G2635>evil<s%> of the <S%G3551>law,<s%> and <S%G2919>judges<s%> the <S%G3551>law:<s%> but <S%G1487>if<s%> you <S%G2919>judge<s%> the <S%G3551>law,<s%> you <S%G1488>are<s%> not a <S%G4163>doer<s%> of the <S%G3551>law,<s%> but a <S%G2923>judge.<s%>

There is <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3550>lawgiver,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> is <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G4982>save<s%> and to <S%G622>destroy:<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G1488>are<s%> you that <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G2087>another?<s%>

<S%G33>Go<s%> to <S%G3568>now,<s%> you that <S%G3004>say,<s%> To <S%G4594>day<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> to <S%G839>morrow<s%> we will <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3592>such<s%> a <S%G4172>city,<s%> and <S%G4160>continue<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> a <S%G1763>year,<s%> and <S%G1710>buy<s%> and <S%G1710>sell,<s%> and get <S%G2770>gain:<s%>

<S%G3748>Whereas<s%> you <S%G1987>know<s%> not <S%G3588>what<s%> shall be on the <S%G839>morrow.<s%> For <S%G4169>what<s%> is <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2222>life?<s%> It is <S%G1063>even<s%> a <S%G822>vapor,<s%> that <S%G5316>appears<s%> for a <S%G3641>little<s%> time, and <S%G1899>then<s%> <S%G853>vanishes<s%> away.
For that you ought to <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G1437>If<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2309>will,<s%> we shall <S%G2198>live,<s%> and <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G5124>this,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> that.
<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> to him that <S%G1492>knows<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2570>good,<s%> and <S%G4160>does<s%> it not, to him it is <S%G266>sin.<s%>
